resources.string: In this main activity screen user will see all the activity. If user click on songs then it will take the user to the songs list activity, if click on albums it will take the user to the albums list activity, if click artists then it will take the user to the artists list activity and if click on now playing then it will take the user to the now playing activity screen.
In this activity user will see a list of artists. Clicking on one of these entries would bring the user to another list activity.
In this activity user will see a list of Albums. Clicking on one of these entries would bring the user to another list activity.
In this activity user will see a list of Songs. Clicking on one of these entries would bring the user to another list activity.
This page shows which song is currently playing or paused. It will have the controls: start, stop, skip, and previous.
